description:
Application made under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended), to amend planning permission ref. P2024/1680/S73, dated 29/10/2024: 

‘’Application to vary Conditions 2 (Approved Documents), 3 (Facing Materials), 5 (Communal Entrances), 6 (CEMP), 7 (Landscaping), 8 (Landscaping Maintenance Plan), 9 (SUDS), 10 (Nesting Boxes), 11 (Tree Protection), 12 (Tree Planting), 13 (Green/Brown Roofs), 14 (Lighting), 16 (Cycle Storage), 17 (Waste), 18 (Car Parking), and 19 (Pedestrian Prioritisation) of planning application ref: P2022/2454/FUL, dated: 25/01/2023 for: (Full planning application for external alterations to all existing buildings (including replacement windows, doors and communal entrances) and landscaping, environmental and wayfinding works (including new bin and cycle stores, new railings to ramps, stepped access to existing buildings, play facilities, lighting, signage and gates).). The applicant seeks to vary these conditions to allow for phased delivery and minor external design changes related to the amended internal kitchen and bathroom layouts.’’ 

The purpose of the S73 application is to correct previous decision notice P2024/1680/S73 to include a date of approval, and to add a drawing to Condition 2 which was omitted in error on the previous submission, and which details the site wide strategy for front door colours.
street_name: Old Barnsbury, The Barnsbury Estate , London, N1 0JE
